CatDescriptText: Miss Alta Pratt, 3373 Webster Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1958, pg. A2, with question: "Do you think that Negroes display any racial prejudice towards each other?"  Answer reads: "No, I don't think that Negroes display any racial prejudice against each other."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alta Pratt standing on Liberty Avenue in front of Jenkins Arcade, with Pittsburgh Courier reporter George Barbour in background, Liberty Avenue Downtown
